context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute bulk actions on multiple items efficiently within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Efficient handling of multiple items
description: Enables power users to execute bulk actions on multiple items efficiently.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a request to handle bulk operations.
preconditions: Power user is logged into the system.
Power user has access to the bulk operations feature.
postconditions: Bulk operations are successfully executed on the selected items.
assumptions: The system has the capability to handle bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to perform bulk operations efficiently.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported by the system.
main_flow: 1. Power user selects multiple items for bulk operations → System displays the selected items.
2. Power user confirms the bulk operation → System processes the bulk operation.
3. System displays a success message for the completed bulk operation.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the bulk operation fails, the system displays an error message and logs the failure.
